column4: Anyone here play warcraft 3 in wine? i have a few config questions.. first off (how come i cant play 32 bit) secondly, (how do i change the mouse cursor)
/join #cedega
k, thanks
i thought cedega costed money
it does
transgaming created cedega off a fork of wine from awhile ago when wine was still under a bsd style license. You can have anonymous cvs access to cedega and compile it yourself.
But there are legal restrictions and it's not technically free software.
any chance you could help me with thaT? :P
wine now is licensed under lgpl, which means any code from when the license was changed for wine from bsd to lgpl..can't be used by cedega.
just illegally download it
fuck transgaming
check www.thepiratebay.org
transgaming is "making a quick buck" off the back of the Wine project,
if it was just off of wine... cedega wouldnt support alot more
their support page is huge
right
type this as root "apt-get install bittornado; btdownloadcurses http://static.thepiratebay.org/downloadtorrent/3407082.torrent/Cedega_5_DEP.3407082.TPB.torrent;"
Then you have the free version of Cedega.
nah, i think im actually gonna pay for it
its not that expensive
You mean you have to keep paying them every month
no, you only have to pay for 1 month.. you just dont get any service or stuff after that month ends, you can still use cedega
